channel.title: Shop help........will anyone help me? for once
channel.description: well in my server i have a barb assault point system with a shop to go with it. but the shop has 3 items. and i would like to add some more items to the shop. but after i add the item and the amount then compile and restart server it will not show. and if i do this with any other shop it works can anyone help me? please help me. i really need to add more items to that shop. please.

that is my whole shop code. the last one at the end does not show.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 05, 2009, 08:48:47 pm[/size][hr]URG I FIXED IT MYSELF! THANKS FOR NOTHING
